full_output.summary: I attend SRM AP to study Computer Science and Engineering with an emphasis on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Im trying to find a job with your company so I can work on developing high- quality goods and get some real-world experience.

projects.name: Employee and Department Management System
projects.description: Developed a Full-Stack Employee Management System using Spring Boot (3+), Spring Security (6+), Spring Data JPA, JWT, React JS (18+), and MySQL. Reduced development time by 30. Configured backend with necessary dependencies, connected MySQL, and developed key packages (Employee JPA Entity, Repository, DTO, Mapper). Created and tested secure CRUD REST APIs using JWT for authentication, leveraging Postman for validation. Developed the frontend with React + Vite, integrated Bootstrap, and connected to the backend via Axios, using modern tools like IntelliJ IDEA, VS Code, and Maven.

projects.name: TitanicSurvivalClassification
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model in Python to predict Titanic passenger survival. Utilized classification algorithms for prediction, including data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation to achieve high accuracy.

projects.name: Fake news detection
projects.description: Developed a Python-based machine learning model to detect fake news by analyzing textual features and patterns. Employed natural language processing techniques and classification algorithms to achieve reliable detection accuracy.

experiences.description: Gained proficiency in Python programming, including libraries such as NumPy and Pandas for data manipulation and analysis. Acquired skills in plotting libraries for effective data visualization and communication of insights.

full_output.name: KANDI MANOHAR RAO
